name: Kaizen
description: Todos los códigos activos para Kaizen en Roblox
metaDescription: Lista actualizada de códigos para Kaizen en Roblox. Consigue recompensas gratis.

expiredCodes.reward: 2x Mastery EXP for 15 minutos, 2 reinicio de stats tokens, and 3 Clan giros
2x Mastery EXP for 15 minutos and 2x EXP for 10 minutos
1,000 Yen and 2x Mastery EXP for 10 minutos
Even a small error can make a code invalid. doble-check your entry or copy and paste the code directly from a reliable source like this guide or the official game channels
Codes often have a limitado lifespan. Developers usually announce expiration dates, but sometimes they’re removed without warning. Redeem codes as soon as you find them to avoid missing out!
Some codes are case-sensitive, so ensure you’re entering uppercase and lowercase letters exactly as shown
Occasionally, a new code might not work immediately on all servers. Try rejoining the game or switching to a different server if you encounter issues
Keep an eye out for new codes whenever the game receives a major update or patch. Developers often include codes as a bonus for players
Developers sometimes recompensa players with codes when the game reaches a certain number of likes, favorites, or visits

howToRedeem: Busca el icono de códigos en el menú
Escribe el código y pulsa Canjear
introText: Kaizen es un juego de anime en Roblox con más de 26 millones de visitas inspirado en Jujutsu Kaisen donde desbloqueas técnicas malditas, combates enemigos y te conviertes en un hechicero legendario.
whatAreCodes: Los códigos de Kaizen te dan spins, monedas y boosts de experiencia para obtener habilidades raras más rápidamente.
howToGetCodes: Los nuevos códigos se publican en el servidor de Discord oficial del juego y en la cuenta de Twitter/X de los desarrolladores.
